QuestData.Title: At the Yak Wash
QuestData.Description: Look, my father is crazy. I love him, but he's crazy.$b$bThese yaungol managed to completely obliterate our ranch and scattered our yaks every which way.$b$bIf I know my father though, he's going to try to go head to head with the yaungol to get the yaks back.$b$bCan you help us round up some of the yaks so my father doesn't do anything stupid?$b$bJust ride them over to the Yak Wash so we can clean them up and sell them to the grummles.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 6 Escaped Yaks to the Wash Entrance at Lao & Son's Yak Wash.
QuestData.CompletionText: The grummles always insist they have better luck with cleaned yaks.$b$bAs long as they pay more I'm not going to argue. We need the gold. Now more than ever.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, stranger! Hopefully we'll be able to cash these in and recoup some of the damages the yaungol inflicted.
